description: This file defines a class AWSLambdaTools that provides methods to interact with AWS Lambda functions, including listing available functions and invoking a specific function, using the boto3 library.

classes.name: AWSLambdaTools
classes.description: A class for interacting with AWS Lambda functions, extending the Toolkit class, providing methods to list and invoke Lambda functions.

methods.name: list_functions
methods.description: Lists all available AWS Lambda functions and returns their names as a string.

methods.name: invoke_function
methods.description: Invokes a specified AWS Lambda function with an optional payload and returns the result or error message.
